Issue.summary: node-SDK dead link in generated documentation
Issue.description: :8000->docs/gen/ 5.From Modules pulldown menu, select hfc This displays a page with this text: Module: hfc This is the main module for the "hfc" (Hyperledger Fabric Client) package. It provides the convenience APIs to the classes of the package including* Chain* where* Chain *is a link. 6.Click *Chain* See this: Error response Error code 404. Message: File not found. Error code explanation: 404 = Nothing matches the given URI. >
